cmp: 半 (half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half/half)
mng: edge, side, boundary, bank (of a river etc), shore

exm.mng: edge, side, boundary, bank (of a river etc), shore

exm.pyn: Āi wén hé pàn Sī tè lā tè fú

exm.mng: to be accommodating in negotiating the boundary of one's field, fig. (of farmers in ancient times) to be good-hearted and honest
